yswvZ-avwyE#12#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1: of the center for Indian Country development or cidc our National Institute dedicated to helping tribes reach their full economic potential we are excited to be expanding its capacity to conduct economic research and data analysis to support long-term economic prosperity of Indian Country in partnership with Indian country
we look forward to see I CDs ongoing collaboration with tribal communities on research and data

additionally an initial St Louis fed partnership with the Osage Nation to provide youth Financial education has led to Partnerships with tribal governments across the country that provide personal finance education often in their native languages

tribal leaders Nationwide have also joined recent listening sessions to discuss the impact of inflation similar sessions were held on our pandemic response facilities which were adapted after hearing their input
